data.title: Leach, George
data.meta_description: George is a solicitor in Anderson Lloyd' projects, construction and energy team. He graduated from the University of Otago in 2021 with Bachelor of Laws and
data.text:
George is a solicitor in Anderson Lloyd’ projects, construction and energy team. He graduated from the University of Otago in 2021 with Bachelor of Laws and Arts (Economics). George joined Anderson Lloyd in 2021 and was admitted to the bar in June 2022. His iwi is Ngāti Kahungunu and joined the firm under the internship programme.

In George’s short time at Anderson Lloyd he has worked on some of New Zealand’s major infrastructure projects under Anton Trixl’s lead. He is curious and engaged in the industry. He enjoys providing proactive and pragmatic advice to help clients achieve their commercial goals.

George is a member of the Society of Construction Law New Zealand.
